sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> shines on your <radical>roof</radical> in the <radical>evening</radical> and a <radical>snake</radical> suddenly appears! Wait, that's not a snake, it's your <kanji>arm</kanji>, sticking out from under the roof.
meaningInfo: Arms really look like snakes in the moonlight. Picture it. Your arm is long and shiny, just like a snake.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>arm</kanji> is exposed to the moon and the outside and you feel a chill. Where are your clothes? Ah, you're n<reading>ude, eh</reading> (<ja>うで</ja>)?! I guess it is pretty common to sleep in the nude, eh?
readingInfo: Your arms are nude, eh? That's why they look like snakes, you know. You should be more careful.
